title: Creamy Sriracha Dressing
description: Spicy and creamy dressing perfect for salads, bowls, and dipping
ingredients: 3 tbsp plain Greek yogurt (or 2 tbsp mayo if you want richer)
1 tbsp olive oil or avocado oil
1 tsp honey or maple syrup (balances the spice, optional if you want less sugar)
1 tsp rice vinegar (or apple cider vinegar)
Juice of ½ lemon (≈ 1 ½ tbsp bottled lemon juice if that's what you've got)
Pinch of garlic powder and salt
instructions: Add all ingredients to a small bowl or jar.
Add a splash of water to thin if needed for drizzling.
Taste and adjust seasoning as needed.
Store in refrigerator for up to 1 week.
notes: Makes about ½ cup. For a vegan version, use maple syrup instead of honey and ensure your sriracha is vegan. The dressing will thicken in the fridge, so you may need to add a little water when serving.
